entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who does not like to think of him alone in his mother's old house.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as someone Sirius might be pulling a lonely cracker with.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as the one who decorated the Room of Requirement for Christmas.

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is mentioned as someone who enters the room and looks around at the decorations.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who sees the decorations and talks to Luna about them.

relationships.description: Dobby decorated the Room of Requirement for Harry's Christmas.
Luna Lovegood spoke to Harry about the decorations.
